INPUT: $IPTABLES -A INPUT -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -j ACCEPT

$IPTABLES -A INPUT -j DROP
$IPTABLES -A INPUT -j REJECT
FORWARD: $IPTABLES -A FORWARD -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -j ACCEPT
$IPTABLES -A FORWARD -j ACCEPT
$IPTABLES -A FORWARD -j DROP
$IPTABLES -A FORWARD -j REJECT

INPUT: $NFT add rule ip filter INPUT ct state new counter accept
$NFT add rule ip filter INPUT counter accept
$NFT add rule ip filter INPUT counter drop
$NFT add rule ip filter INPUT counter reject
FORWARD: $NFT add rule ip filter FORWARD ct state new counter accept
$NFT add rule ip filter FORWARD counter accept
$NFT add rule ip filter FORWARD counter drop
$NFT add rule ip filter FORWARD counter reject

INPUT:
set firewall name INPUT state new enable
set firewall name INPUT action accept
set firewall name INPUT action accept
set firewall name INPUT action drop
set firewall name INPUT action reject
FORWARD:
set firewall name FORWARD state new enable
set firewall name FORWARD action accept
set firewall name FORWARD action accept
set firewall name FORWARD action drop
set firewall name FORWARD action reject
